channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Boomers are setting up a showdown with millennials, aging in place and plunking down hundreds of thousands on renovating their homes
item.description: Millennials need homes, but because of high home prices and mortgage rates, baby boomers have little reason to sell.

item.title: Syria’s Interim President Calls for Unity Amid Fresh Fighting
item.description: More than 1,000 people have been killed in clashes in the coastal provinces of Syria, according to one war monitoring group.

item.title: Secret Service Shoots Armed Man Near the White House
item.description: President Trump was in Florida at the time of the episode, during which a man held a gun and a confrontation ensued, the agency said.

item.title: Violence Sweeps Coastal Syria, Sowing Chaos: ‘We Have to Get Out of Here’
item.description: Residents described shootings outside their homes and bodies in the streets in Syria’s worst unrest since Bashar al-Assad’s ouster. More than 1,000 pe...

item.title: Why jeweler Kendra Scott is winning affordable luxury and plans to open dozens of stores while others are downsizing
item.description: The company grew 20% year-over-year, CEO Tom Nolan told Fortune.

item.title: Hamburg Airport Halts All Flights as Ground Staff Strike
item.description: The airport in Germany’s second largest city said the one-day strike, called over pay and conditions, began earlier than expected “without any notice....

item.title: Syria’s Interim President Calls for Unity Amid Fresh Fighting
item.description: More than 1,000 people have been killed in clashes in the coastal provinces of Syria, according to one war monitoring group.

item.title: Trump Pulled $400 million From Columbia. Other Schools Could Be Next.
item.description: The administration has circulated a list that includes nine other campuses, accusing them of failure to address antisemitism.

item.title: This 25-year-old was fired from her day job—Now, she and others are their own boss with the help of AI tutors
item.description: Valerie Chapman and Mordy Golding use AI tutors to learn brand-building, communication skills, client information, and complex topics quickly.

item.title: How a health savings account fits into your retirement strategy
item.description: Here's what you need to know about your health savings account.

item.title: Inside the Sean ’Diddy’ Combs Hotline: The Makings of a Mass Tort
item.description: From a low-slung building in Montana, employees process sex abuse complaints against the music mogul that have been drawn to them through advertising ...

item.title: Meet the defense giants that will rearm Europe as the EU eyes a massive military buildup
item.description: As Europe prepares for a world without American military aid, the E.U. plans to invest €800 billion on defense.

item.title: Canada’s Liberal Party To Elect New Leader and Prime Minister to Replace Trudeau: What to Know
item.description: Front-runner Mark Carney and underdog Chrystia Freeland, both established, centrist policymakers, are vying to succeed Justin Trudeau amid grave threa...

item.title: Plan to Return Russian Diplomats to U.S. Poses Espionage Risk
item.description: The Trump administration is negotiating the return of more Russian diplomats to the United States. Some are likely to be spies.
